description: Saves a home position for when the entity is spawned. This component allows entities like bees to remember and return to a specific location such as a hive or nest.

tokens.text: has a home location to return to

fields.description: Defines how the entity will be restricted to its home position. Valid values are: 'none' (no restriction), 'random_movement' (restricts random wandering to be near home), and 'all_movement' (restricts all movement to be near home, though entities can always move closer to home if they are too far away).

generated_doNotEdit.title: Home
generated_doNotEdit.description: Saves a home position for when the the entity is spawned.

fields.title: Home Block List
fields.description:
Optional list of blocks that can be considered a valid home. If no such block longer exists at that position,
											the home restriction is removed. Example syntax: minecraft:sand. Not supported: minecraft:sand:1.

fields.title: Restriction Radius
fields.description: Optional radius that the entity will be restricted to in relation to its home.

fields.title: Restriction Type
fields.description:
Defines how the the entity will be restricted to its home position. The possible values are:
												\n- "none", which poses no restriction.
												\n- "random_movement", which restricts randomized movement to be around the home position.
												\n- "all_movement", which restricts any kind of movement to be around the home position.
													However, entities that somehow got too far away from their home will always be able to move closer to it, if prompted to do so.
